name: Restart to Update
description:
You're the owner of a computer lab, and the computers are updating! Restart them to prevent malware from infecting your computers.

Music glitch: I know of this glitch but I can't fix it because the patch took 10 minutes to compile, and that was after the deadline. If you want to hear the music while playing,  here's the track on YouTube: 

Controls:

Move: WASD

Fix/Restart: E (hold)

CREDITS:

PROGRAMING: mang432

ART: Ioni

MUSIC: Coffeey (aka Isix)
